mapper.select: SELECT a.ctprvnNm AS name, SUM(s.store_count) AS `count` FROM adm_area a JOIN adong_stats s ON s.adongCd = a.adongCd GROUP BY a.ctprvnNm HAVING name IS NOT NULL AND name != '' ORDER BY `count` DESC, name ASC

SELECT a.signguNm AS name, SUM(s.store_count) AS `count` FROM adm_area a JOIN adong_stats s ON s.adongCd = a.adongCd WHERE a.ctprvnNm = #{sido} GROUP BY a.signguNm HAVING name IS NOT NULL AND name != '' ORDER BY `count` DESC, name ASC

SELECT a.adongNm AS name, SUM(s.store_count) AS `count` FROM adm_area a JOIN adong_stats s ON s.adongCd = a.adongCd WHERE a.ctprvnNm = #{sido} and a.signguNm = #{sigungu} GROUP BY a.adongNm HAVING name IS NOT NULL AND name != '' ORDER BY `count` DESC, name ASC
SELECT ctprvnNm AS sido, signguNm AS sigungu, center_lat AS centerLat, center_lng AS centerLng FROM area_center_gu WHERE ctprvnNm = #{sido} AND signguNm = #{sigungu}

SELECT adongCd AS adongCd, ctprvnNm AS sido, signguNm AS sigungu, adongNm AS dong, center_lat AS centerLat, center_lng AS centerLng FROM area_center_dong WHERE ctprvnNm = #{sido} AND signguNm = #{sigungu} AND adongNm = #{dong}
